overview: #ChineseMayors: What does it take to be a  Chinese official? How is public policy formulated? In what ways does the government serve the people, and how can it be held accountable?  In this 106-minute #documentary, Xinhua's Miao Xiaojuan @miaoxiaojuan and seven experts from around the world travel across China to find out how democracy here differs from in the West. Worth a watch!
title: Chinese Mayors
